about_the_game:
Trolling Bowling is a cross between a realistic physics driven bowling game, and everything you were told to never do at a bowling alley. Bowl as normal, but hit the golden rings to earn trolling points. 

Trolling Powers

Use your troll points to buy troll powers that hinder your opponents. Use a fog machine to blind them, cover the lane in landmines, or cover their ball in glue.

Specialized Bowling Balls

Use your troll points to purchase upgraded balls that help you counter the troll powers your opponents use on you. Did they turn your pins to concrete? Turn your ball into a grenade and blow right through!

Features

  • Realistic pro-level lane oil patterns

  • Practice mode to hone your skills countering troll powers

  • Classic bowling mode without troll powers or unrealistic balls

  • Multiplayer matches with up to 8 players

  • Many different whacky character models to choose from

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4150 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 / AMD HD 7870 / Intel Arc A380
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A fun multiplayer physics-based bowling sim mixed with everything you were told not to do at a bowling alley. Bowl to score and earn points that you can spend to troll your opponents and make their turns harder, or upgrade your own ball to counter their attempts to troll you. Troll or be trolled
